item.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Community Gardening Awareness Week.
A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Community Gardening Awareness Week.

item.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Community Gardening Awareness Week.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. (text of measure as introduced: CR S6229)

item.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. (text of measure as introduced: CR S6229)

item.name: Introduced in Senate
item.text:
Supports the goals and ideals of National Community Gardening Awareness Week, including:

  • raising awareness about the importance of community gardens and urban agriculture;
  • improving access to public land for the creation of sustainable food projects;
  • encouraging growth of community gardens; and
  • supporting cooperative efforts among federal, state, and local governments and nonprofit organizations to promote the development and expansion of community gardens and to increase accessibility to disadvantaged population groups.

item.latestTitle: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Community Gardening Awareness Week.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
